sentences.sContent: He had a cold and spoke with a slight snuffle.
sentences.sCn: 他感冒了， 说话有点齉鼻儿。

sentences.sContent: Since then, he's lost 45 pounds, and he says he hasn't had a cold in seven years.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since then, he's lost 45 pounds, and he says he hasn't had a cold in seven years.
sentences.sCn: 自从那时起，他逐渐减掉了45磅，他还说他在七年里没有得过一次感冒。

sentences.sContent: My weight came into balance, my skin got better, and my cholesterol dropped. I haven’t had a cold in eight years.
sentences.sContent_eng: My weight came into balance, my skin got better, and my cholesterol dropped. I haven’t had a cold in eight years.
sentences.sCn: “我确信纯素食主义者的饮食会使我变得更加的强壮和健康，”《疯狂的性感饮食》的作者克里斯·卡尔说（当他在2003年被诊断为一种罕见的不可治愈的白血病第4期的时候成为了纯素食主义者）“我的体重变得平衡了，我的皮肤变得更好了，我的血脂降下来了，在8年里我没有感冒过。”
